tool_description: A simple way to verify Bangladesh user's phone number verification with the lowest cost.
name: Lowest Cost OTP Via SMS for Bangladesh
title: Lowest Cost OTP Via SMS for Bangladesh
tool_name: Lowest Cost OTP Via SMS for Bangladesh

api_list.name: Send OTP
api_list.description: Send OTP with a phone number only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lowest-cost-otp-via-sms-for-bangladesh.p.rapidapi.com/send-otp-sms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lowest-cost-otp-via-sms-for-bangladesh.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
